text: Hôtel électrique is a 1908 French silent comedy movie directed by Segundo de ChomónClive Davies. Spinegrinder: The Movies Most Critics Won’t Write AboutELECTRIC HOTEL and stars Segundo de Chomón and Julienne Mathieu. ==Actors== * Segundo de Chomón as Bertrand * Julienne Mathieu as Laure ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1908 comedy movies Category:French comedy movies Category:French silent movies
title: Hôtel électrique
